channel.title: Nintendo DS Skill Cape
channel.description:
My Nintendo DS Skill Cape... I'll be making a PSP one.
99.9% Credits to JaGeX for making the Default Skill Cape Model... and 00.1% for Myself for Recoloring and Adding the DS Logo
Here's the XBOX 360 "Wear" Cape: http://rapidshare.com/files/356933291/NDS_Skill_Cape__Normal_.mqo
Here's the XBOX 360 "Drop" Cape: http://rapidshare.com/files/356932779/NDS_Skill_Cape__Normal_DROP.mqo
PLEASE COMMENT!!!
(P.S. If you don't have anything NICE to say... THEN DON'T SAY IT PLEASE!)
